attributes.action: Ban all face coverings in public places.
attributes.additional_details: In cases where a crime is committed where a person has their face covered it is impossible to give police a description of a person. It gives criminals opportunity to commit crimes and not be identified. The world will be safer where every british citizen must not be allowed to cover their faces in public
attributes.background: Ban all face coverings in public places. It is important to see a persons identity.
